subject: Negotiation
title: Strengthening Your BATNA
description: A short lesson to help you apply Strengthening Your BATNA.

hook.text: Before entering any negotiation, the single most important task is improving your backup plan.

buildup.text: Your BATNA â€” Best Alternative to a Negotiated Agreement â€” sets the floor for what you'll accept.

discovery.text: A strong BATNA lets you say no confidently. A weak one forces you to accept whatever is offered.

twist.text: You don't need to use your BATNA. Just having it changes the way the other side treats you.

climax.text: Before negotiating the deal, negotiate your alternatives. Stronger backups mean stronger results.

punchline.text: Your best deal starts with your best backup plan.

quiz.question: Why should you strengthen your BATNA before negotiating?
options: A stronger backup plan raises the floor for what you'll accept
